title: linux/386: disable 80-bit rounding
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. hg pull -u
2. gmake

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

--- FAIL: math_test.TestExp
        Exp(9.636293707198417) = 15310.493273896027, want 
15310.493273896034
--- FAIL: math_test.TestSinh
        Sinh(9.636293707198417) = 7655.246604290673, want 7655.246604290676
FAIL

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

GOOS=freebsd (9.0-CURRENT), GOARCH=386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

d34a988accfa tip

Please provide any additional information below.
